Uses of Interface
main.node.Node

  • Packages that use Node 
    Package Description
    main.algorithm  
    main.node  
    main.tree  

    • Uses of Node in main.algorithm

      Methods in main.algorithm that return Node 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Node Gini.getBestNode() 
      Node Entropy.getBestNode()
      Uses the Entropy algorithm to construct the best decision node that it can.
      abstract Node Algorithm.getBestNode()
      This method must be implemented in a child class.

    • Uses of Node in main.node

      Classes in main.node that implement Node 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Leaf
      This class implements the Node interface, and is used as the leaf nodes for the tree.
      class  NominalDecisionNode
      This class implements the Node interface and is made to deal with Nominal data.
      class  OrdinalDecisionNode
      This class implements the Node interface and is made to deal with any Numeric data.
      Methods in main.node that return Node 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Node OrdinalDecisionNode.getLeft() 
      Node NominalDecisionNode.getLeft() 
      Node Node.getLeft() 
      Node Leaf.getLeft()
      This method is not needed for a leaf.
      Node OrdinalDecisionNode.getRight() 
      Node NominalDecisionNode.getRight() 
      Node Node.getRight() 
      Node Leaf.getRight()
      This method is not needed for a leaf.
      Node Leaf.makeNewDecisionNode()
      Creates a new Decision Node using the data it has collected, and the algorithm it was constructed with.
      Methods in main.node with parameters of type Node 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void OrdinalDecisionNode.setLeft(Node left)
      Sets the left child node to a new node.
      void NominalDecisionNode.setLeft(Node left)
      Sets the left child node to a new node.
      void Node.setLeft(Node left) 
      void Leaf.setLeft(Node left)
      This method is not needed for a leaf and does nothing.
      void OrdinalDecisionNode.setRight(Node right)
      Sets the right child node to a new node.
      void NominalDecisionNode.setRight(Node right)
      Sets the right child node to a new node.
      void Node.setRight(Node right) 
      void Leaf.setRight(Node right)
      This method is not needed for a leaf and does nothing.

    • Uses of Node in main.tree

      Methods in main.tree with parameters of type Node 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void DecisionTree.inOrderCheck(Node n)
      Does an in order traversal of the tree to check if any of the leaf nodes need to split again.
